visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with multiple X axes. The chart should have a title 'Multiple X axes'. The first X axis should display categories in Norwegian ('Ein', 'To', 'Tre', 'Fire') with a title 'Norwegian'. The second X axis should display categories in Spanish ('Uno', 'Dos', 'Tres', 'Quatro') with a title 'Spanish'. The legend should be aligned to the right, vertically aligned in the middle, and laid out vertically. The chart should have two series, each with data points [1, 2, 3, 4], with the second series mapped to the second X axis.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with multiple X axes. The chart title is set to 'Multiple X axes'. The first X axis displays categories in Norwegian with the title 'Norwegian', while the second X axis displays categories in Spanish with the title 'Spanish'. The legend is configured to be aligned to the right, vertically aligned in the middle, and laid out vertically. The chart includes two series, each with data points [1, 2, 3, 4]. The second series is mapped to the second X axis using the 'xAxis' property set to 1.
